S3 E19

TV-14 V, L 43min | 2020

Stream Now on CBS All Access

While Jason escorts Mandy on a condolence visit to the family of a fallen informant, Ray leads Bravo on an urgent mission when they are confronted with a time-sensitive lead on a terrorist leader's location. Also, Davis reveals to the team that the terrorist leader they've been searching for is related to a target from Jason's past, and Sonny rejoins Bravo team in Afghanistan. (TV-14 L, V) Air Date: May 6, 2020
